title: Absorb Elements
desc:
Post 1882
- Can be played instantly as a reaction when a ‚ö°, ‚ùÑÔ∏è, <:element:1107480918710571058>, <:inferno:1118594776716021780>, <:sprout:1118917438893985802>, üåä, <:partisan:1107460550268559380>, <:holy:1120560132150022184>, <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551>, <:grave:1119394182310670366>, <:gloom:1187518684143550605> or <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> card that affects you is played.
- It will have its effects negated on you specifically.
- You may swap one of your cards' effect to the effect of the negated card.
- Costs 1 **Spell slot**, +1 if you wish to use it on a <:partisan:1107460550268559380>, <:holy:1120560132150022184>, <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551>, <:grave:1119394182310670366>, <:gloom:1187518684143550605> or <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> card, +1 if you swap a card's effect.
